meanings.definition: The act of disappearing or vanishing from sight.
meanings.sent1: The disappearances of the magician's assistant amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The disappearances of the stars in the night sky are a natural phenomenon.
meanings.sent3: The disappearances of socks in the laundry seem to be a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The disappearances of shadows at noon create a surreal atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The disappearances of bubbles when they pop always catch my eye.

meanings.definition: The state of being lost or missing without explanation.
meanings.sent1: The disappearances of keys always cause frustration.
meanings.sent2: The disappearances of ships in the Bermuda Triangle remain unexplained.
meanings.sent3: The disappearances of pens on my desk make me question my memory.
meanings.sent4: The disappearances of time during a captivating movie are magical.
meanings.sent5: The disappearances of words on the page puzzled the young reader.
